Can I create a custom coin that can be converted to using only GOLD?

To create a custom coin, you need to specify that it can be converted to using either GOLD or VRSCTEST, not just GOLD. The correct process is to create the custom coin with the option to convert to it using either GOLD or VRSCTEST.

T sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
that would effectively park my conversion until the token launches, at which point, I will either find 0.975 GOLD in my wallet, or I will have my VRSCTEST back.
